name: googleSheetAutocomplete
label: Google Sheet Autocomplete
description: An autocomplete widget with fuzzy search using data from a Google Sheet.

googleSheetId.label: Google Sheet ID
googleSheetId.description: Enter the ID of your public Google Sheet.

columnIndex.label: Column Index
columnIndex.description: Enter the zero-based index of the column to use for autocomplete (e.g., 0 for the first column).

placeholderText.label: Placeholder Text
placeholderText.description: Specify the placeholder text for the input field.

inputWidth.label: Input Field Width
inputWidth.description: Specify the width of the input field (e.g., '100%', '300px').

autocompleteWidth.label: Autocomplete List Width
autocompleteWidth.description: Specify the width of the autocomplete suggestions list (e.g., '100%', '300px').

dynamicResize.label: Enable Dynamic Resize
dynamicResize.description: Adjust iframe height dynamically when suggestions are displayed.

threshold.label: Search Threshold
threshold.description: Controls how fuzzy the search is (0.0 to 1.0). Lower values are more exact.

distance.label: Search Distance
distance.description: Maximum distance for a match. Shorter distances are more exact.

maxResults.label: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of suggestions to display.

minCharRequired.label: Minimum Characters Required
minCharRequired.description: Minimum number of characters before suggestions appear.

debounceTime.label: Debounce Time (ms)
debounceTime.description: Delay in milliseconds for debouncing the input.
